Drexel New Online MS in Business Analytics

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Business Analytics, Drexel University, MS in Business Analytics, Online Education

With Drexel University’s online MS in Business Analytics program, you’ll be able to effectively analyze this overlooked data to give your company and yourself a competitive edge.


On average, only 15% of data is actually analyzed, leaving a wide variety of rich, informative data – including text, audio and video – unused and forgotten. With Drexel University’s online MS in Business Analytics program, you’ll be able to effectively analyze this overlooked data to give your company and yourself a competitive edge.

Program Benefits:

  • Focus on three pillars of business analytics: Statistics, Modeling, and Data Management
  • Learn how to formulate a problem, model the data accordingly, analyze the data, and ultimately derive business value from that problem
  • Learn online and on your own schedule as you prepare for some of the most sought-after jobs on the market today

It’s time to start making the most out of your data.

Learn More
       
Drexel University Online | 3025 Market Street Suite 300 | Philadelphia, PA 19104
